class.name: DotnetRestoreStep
class.description: A [dotnet restore step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command

function.name: dotnetRestore
function.description: Adds a [dotnet restore step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command @see DotnetRestoreStep

param.name: paths
param.description: Specify paths to projects and solutions. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: nuget.packageSources
param.description: Specifies NuGet package sources to use during the restore.

param.name: nuget.configFile
param.description: The NuGet configuration file to use.

param.name: args
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for dotnet restore.

param.name: required.sdk
param.description: .NET SDK versions separated by semicolon to be required on agents.
